about_the_game:
On a drive back from a forest festival up in Squam you find Vanbay still roaring as "Riot Odyssey Fest" has taken over the city but it is not the only thing to have taken over the city. As flames soar people seem to be possessed by an infectious tune playing over the radio and in various venues in town.


Step into the enchanting world of "Vanbay: Mosh It Up," a captivating adventure that draws inspiration from classic PSX RPGs like the Mother series, Final Fantasy, and Silent Hill, while infusing modern concepts. Immerse yourself in a narrative-driven experience where every corner of the voxel-based Vancouver holds secrets waiting to be uncovered.




In good old "Pokémon" fashion ally and duel with strangers, save their souls, and turn them back to regular folks who may choose to come with you on this adventure. Recruit almost everyone and anyone in town who can play music to turn the tides and destroy find out why the city is in such shambles.





I will be polishing and expanding on this battle-mini game to add complexity to the battle system.

Feature Highlights:

Voxel Art: Discover a visually stunning world brought to life through vibrant voxel art, creating a unique and immersive atmosphere. Every character, building, and vehicle has been personally crafted for this game.
Rock-Paper-Scissors Style RPG Combat: Engage in intuitive and dynamic combat inspired by the classic game of rock-paper-scissors, offering strategic depth and easy-to-follow mechanics. Recruit band members who fall under a certain element and rip through some guitar-hero-style mini-games.
Dark Magic and Eerie Atmosphere: Delve into the depths of Vanbay's dark magic-infused landscape, where secrets lurk around every corner and the atmosphere crackles with intrigue.
Intriguing Characters: Meet a diverse cast of characters, each with their own motivations and secrets to uncover. From enigmatic allies to mischievous troublemakers, every interaction leaves its mark on the journey.
Explore Voxel-Based Vancouver: Traverse the various districts of Vanbay, including downtown, East Vanbay, Main Street, and Chill Kits Beach Area. Each offers its own unique challenges and discoveries.
Forge alliances with a wide range of characters, from ordinary citizens to legendary rock icons roaming the streets. Your choices will shape the fate of Vanbay and its inhabitants.
Music Festival Extravaganza: Immerse yourself in the electric atmosphere of the music festival that has taken over Vanbay, where concerts and performances serve as both a backdrop and catalyst for the unfolding events.

content_descriptors.notes: In VanBay you will be travelling around the city for a night out going to shows and trying to take down an evil musical corporation. Alcohol and Tobacco are used as well as cursing.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 12.6
  • Processor: 2.8GHz Quad-core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 2GB
  • Additional Notes: These are the specs I made the game with. This should run on a potato with a bit of memory.

short_description: THE DEMO FOR VANBAY MOSH IT UP: This will take the players from the forest of SquamCity to the mesmerizing world of Vanbay, a city where music isn't merely a form of expression—it's the source of potent enchantments and profound mysteries. Thrust into a world of pulsating beats and magical auras.
